text: Bunkar Mahasabha is a trade union of weavers in Varanasi, India. Bunkar Mahasabha was formed in 2001. The union is affiliated to the All India Central Council of Trade Unions. Category:All India Central Council of Trade Unions Category:Organisations based in Varanasi Category:Textile and clothing trade unions Category:Trade unions established in 2001
title: Bunkar Mahasabha
